page.title: 07HILLEND ARTIFICIAL SKI SLOPE
page.content: THE CENTRE WHICH STARTED ON A TRIAL BASIS IN 1964 OWES MUCH TO THE LATE G. BOYD ANDERSON, WHOSE INTEREST AND FINANCIAL SUPPORT LED TO ITS DEVELOPMENT. THE CENTRE WHICH IS OPEN {80}HOURS A WEEK NOW OFFERS A CHOICE OF SKI-ING ACTIVITIES WITH DOWNHILL AND GRASS SKI-ING.THE FACILITIES INCLUDE- 1. FULL DAYTIME PROGRAMME FOR LOTHIAN REGIONAL SCHOOLS. 2. CLASSES FOR BEGINNERS TO ADVANCED. 3. SPECIAL RACE TRAINING FOR THOSE SHOWING POTENTIAL. 4. COURSES FOR TEACHERS IN LOTHIAN. 5. INSTUCTORS COURSES. 6. PROMOTION AND ORGANISATION OF RACES. 7.
